about_the_game:
Enter the bleak world of VISK, an online co-op horror game for 1-2 players.
You and your friend are sent to a desolate village.
Uncover the dark secrets of this place and cautiously explore your surroundings.
After all, you might not be alone…

Play with a friend or in single player

  • 2 player online co-op mode
    Play alongside your friend and cooperate to progress.
    Work together using walkie-talkies and proximity voice-chat.
  • Single player mode
    Go into this dreary experience alone.
    No one will come to help you.

Uncover the truth


Who sent you here? What happened to this village? Are you really alone?
Discover unique environments as you search for answers.

Explore the past


Solve puzzles, search for key items and interact with the environment to gain access to new places.
Search for remains of a past life and figure out what happened here.

name: VISK

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 or new-gen i3 / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 or AMD equivalent (AMD FX 9500+ Series)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Enter the bleak world of VISK, an online co-op horror game for 1-2 players. You and your friend are sent to a desolate village. Uncover the dark secrets of this place and cautiously explore your surroundings. After all, you might not be alone…
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian
